data.md:MetaData: (Table T1) Concentrations of iodine, bromine, and chlorine in pore water of ODP Site 204-1250
53 cores, 378 m cored, 498 m drilled, 87.8 % recovery
Data report: 129I/I ratios and halogen concentrations in pore water of Hydrate Ridge and their relevance for the origin of gas hydrates: a progress report
